roleset.name: Finish a matter decisively, as with a heavy blow or doxology.

example.name: gerund
example.text: `` Well , I guess I know enough to turn you inside out , you sockdologizing old mantrap '' ! !
example.note: "Our American Cousin" is the play Abraham Lincoln was watching when he was killed. John Wilkes Boothe timed his shot to coincide with and be covered up by the laugheter following THIS line!

predicate.note: This word is an early American corruption of "doxologize". (A doxology is a short hymn of praises to God in various Christian worship services, often added to the end of canticles, psalms, and hymns, as a finishing act.)
